name: Gemstone hunters
description:
Inspired by card game Dobble (also known as SpotIt!)

Objective of the game is to find the a matching gem between gems inside golden box usually in the middle of the screen and your own box. There will always be one matching gem between the two - size of each gem can be different.

Game can be played in many game modes. Each mode has some cutomization options that can increase or lower the difficulty.

Web browser version is limited for only up to 2 players! You can still add AI players though. Full game is downloadable zip.

Featuers

  • Over 130 unique gems.
  • 4 game modes.
  • Controller support for up to 4 players.
  • Some basic AI for computer players.

Furute plans

Game is still a work in progress. Expect more game modes and more polishing.

If you run into some bugs or have a suggestion feel free to comment!
